bullets.title: Documentation & Guidance Gaps
bullets.sentence: Users struggle with "lack of documentation" and want clearer guidance on patterns like "leveraging SPIRE/SPIFFE identities for microservice authentication" â€” noting "there might be room for clearly documenting that as a good option."

bullets.title: Development & Data Challenges
bullets.sentence: Practical hurdles include "local development without kubernetes" requiring nginx workarounds, and "getting external data into it," leading teams to build custom bundle servers.

bullets.title: Release & Policy Management
bullets.sentence: Operational concerns include being "always behind the main OPA releases by few days" and difficulties "evaluating multiple policies."
